name: netflix-clone
description: Netflix clone built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and Owl Carousel

scripts.copy-deps: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js js/owl/ && cp node_modules/owl.carousel/dist/owl.carousel.min.js js/owl/ && cp node_modules/owl.carousel/dist/assets/*.css style/owl/

author: Adriano Cristino
